scripts.test:all: cd packages/pandapage && bun test:all && cd ../demo && bun test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: cd packages/parser && bun run test:coverage && cd ../renderer-markdown && bun run test:coverage && cd ../renderer-dom && bun run test:coverage && cd ../pandapage && bun run test:coverage
scripts.test:unit: cd packages/parser && bun test --coverage && cd ../renderer-markdown && bun test --coverage && cd ../renderer-dom && bun test --coverage && cd ../pandapage && bun test --coverage test/*.test.ts
scripts.typecheck: cd packages/parser && bun run typecheck && cd ../renderer-markdown && bun run typecheck && cd ../renderer-dom && bun run typecheck && cd ../pandapage && bun run typecheck
scripts.test:e2e:headless: cd packages/demo && bun run build && npx playwright test --config=playwright.precommit.config.ts
scripts.precommit: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test:unit
